arts.ttl: Everything we know about Emi Martínez injury as Aston Villa prepare for Burnley clash
arts.sum: Aston Villa face an anxious wait over the fitness of Emiliano Martínez after the goalkeeper suffered a calf problem in the warm-up before Thursday’s Europa League win over Feyenoord. Martínez was named to start in Rotterdam but was replaced at the last moment by Marco Bizot, who helped Villa secure an impressive 2–0 victory. arts.ttl: Aston Villa v Burnley: predicted line-up, team news and match preview
arts.sum: After starting the season winless in six, Aston Villa welcome Burnley to Villa Park on Sunday now unbeaten in six, excluding a penalty shoot-out, and on the back of three consecutive victories. Villa have won twice in the Europa League and just once in the Premier League.
